mapper.select: SELECT id, is_pick, sub_problem_unit_score, problem_type, problem_value_id, sub_problem_value_id, oppt_id, oppt_name FROM t_form_oppt_value WHERE is_pick = true AND form_result_id = #{formResultId} GROUP BY oppt_id
select * from t_form_oppt_value where sub_problem_value_id=#{subProblemValueId} and sub_problem_id=#{subProblemId} and sub_header_id=#{subProblemHeaderId} and problem_type=#{problemType}
select * from t_form_oppt_value where problem_value_id=#{problemValueId} and oppt_id=#{opptId} and problem_type=#{problemType}
